title: A Super Valuable Comic Book
summary: A very old comic book from 1938, called Action Comics No 1, was sold for $15 million. This comic introduced Superman to the world. It used to belong to the famous actor Nicolas Cage. In 2000, it was stolen from his home during a party. The comic was missing for 11 years until it was found in a storage unit in California in 2011. After it was returned, Cage sold it for $2.2 million. Now, an anonymous collector bought it for much more money. This comic is very rare, with fewer than 100 copies left. It helped create the superhero stories we love today.

It was once stolen from actor Nicolas Cage but later found and sold. Comic books like this are rare and collected by people who love them. They tell stories with pictures and are part of American pop culture.
